Text: Last week, they closed at £1.56, partly reflecting market disillusion with smaller firms and partly reflecting concerns that the Watbio integration has taken longer than expected.
Cause: market disillusion with smaller firms and partly reflecting concerns that the Watbio integration has taken longer than expected.
